txt.en: You have summoned a cosmetic companion.  This companion will follow you around, but will not participate in combat.  You may only have one companion summoned at a time, whether cosmetic or combative.  To release your companion use the command /pet release.

You have summoned a cosmetic companion. This companion will follow you around, but will not participate in combat. You may only have one companion summoned at a time, whether cosmetic or combative. To release your companion use the command /pet release.
